insights.populationGrowth: Stable 0.1% with unique Kazakh cultural identity supporting population retention despite remote location.
insights.educationLevel: Good 78% literacy with trilingual education (Mongolian, Kazakh, Russian/Chinese).
insights.employmentPattern: Livestock 50%, eagle hunting tourism 20%, crafts 15%, cross-border trade 10%, government 5%.

insights.temperature: High-altitude mountain climate, extreme winters (-40°C), cool summers (22°C). Altai Mountains create severe conditions.
insights.precipitation: Moderate 240mm with mountain snow. Winter snow critical for water supply.
insights.seasonality: Brutal 7-month winter, brief summer, spectacular autumn for eagle hunting tourism.
insights.extremeEvents: Extreme dzud events, avalanches, severe mountain storms, flash floods.

recentDisasters.impact: Cultural way of life threatened, mass livestock death

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Very Low - Extreme remoteness, harsh terrain, limited access

economicProfile.businessEnvironment: Unique Kazakh culture drives specialized tourism, traditional economy, extreme geographic challenges

culturalHeritage.ethnic: Majority Kazakh (90%) with distinct cultural identity, language, and traditions
culturalHeritage.traditions: Eagle hunting heritage, traditional crafts, nomadic lifestyle, Islamic culture
culturalHeritage.festivals: Golden Eagle Festival (world-famous), Kazakh cultural celebrations, hunting competitions
